sourcesContent:
{{title}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-grid', templateUrl: './game-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game-grid.component.css'] }) export class GameGridComponent { title = 'Minefield' colArray: number[] = []; rowArray: number[] = []; bombArray: boolean[] = []; columns = 4; rows = 10; bombs = 6; setDimension() { this.colArray = []; this.rowArray = []; for (let i = 0; i <= this.columns; i++) { this.colArray.push(i); } for (let i = 0; i <= this.rows; i++) { this.rowArray.push(i); } for (let i = 0; i <= this.rows * this.columns; i++) { if (i <= this.bombs) { this.bombArray.push(true); } else { this.bombArray.push(false); } } this.bombArray.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5); } }
